001package org.jfree.chart.plot;
002
003
004import java.awt.Image;
005import org.jfree.chart.api.RectangleAlignment;
006import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
007import java.awt.Graphics2D;
008import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
009import java.awt.Composite;
010import java.awt.AlphaComposite;
011import java.awt.Shape;
012import java.io.Serializable;
013import org.jfree.chart.api.PublicCloneable;
014
015public class PlotProduct implements Serializable, PublicCloneable {
016        private transient Image backgroundImage;
017        private RectangleAlignment backgroundImageAlignment = RectangleAlignment.FILL;
018        private float backgroundImageAlpha = 0.5f;
019
020        public Image getBackgroundImage() {
021                return backgroundImage;
022        }
023
024        public void setBackgroundImage2(Image backgroundImage) {
025                this.backgroundImage = backgroundImage;
026        }
027
028        public RectangleAlignment getBackgroundImageAlignment() {
029                return backgroundImageAlignment;
030        }
031
032        public float getBackgroundImageAlpha() {
033                return backgroundImageAlpha;
034        }
035
036        /**
037        * Sets the background image for the plot and sends a {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
038        * @param image   the image ( {@code  null}  permitted).
039        * @see #getBackgroundImage()
040        */
041        public void setBackgroundImage(Image image, Plot plot) {
042                this.backgroundImage = image;
043                plot.fireChangeEvent();
044        }
045
046        /**
047        * Sets the alignment for the background image and sends a {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.  
048        * @param alignment   the alignment ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
049        * @see #getBackgroundImageAlignment()
050        */
051        public void setBackgroundImageAlignment(RectangleAlignment alignment, Plot plot) {
052                Args.nullNotPermitted(alignment, "alignment");
053                if (this.backgroundImageAlignment != alignment) {
054                        this.backgroundImageAlignment = alignment;
055                        plot.fireChangeEvent();
056                }
057        }
058
059        /**
060        * Sets the alpha transparency used when drawing the background image.
061        * @param alpha   the alpha transparency (in the range 0.0f to 1.0f, where 0.0f is fully transparent, and 1.0f is fully opaque).
062        * @throws IllegalArgumentException  if  {@code  alpha}  is not within the specified range.
063        * @see #getBackgroundImageAlpha()
064        */
065        public void setBackgroundImageAlpha(float alpha, Plot plot) {
066                if (alpha < 0.0f || alpha > 1.0f) {
067                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("The 'alpha' value must be in the range 0.0f to 1.0f.");
068                }
069                if (this.backgroundImageAlpha != alpha) {
070                        this.backgroundImageAlpha = alpha;
071                        plot.fireChangeEvent();
072                }
073        }
074
075        /**
076        * Draws the background image (if there is one) aligned within the specified area.
077        * @param g2   the graphics device.
078        * @param area   the area.
079        * @see #getBackgroundImage()
080        * @see #getBackgroundImageAlignment()
081        * @see #getBackgroundImageAlpha()
082        */
083        public void drawBackgroundImage(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area) {
084                if (this.backgroundImage == null) {
085                        return;
086                }
087                Composite savedComposite = g2.getComposite();
088                g2.setComposite(AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER, this.backgroundImageAlpha));
089                Rectangle2D dest = new Rectangle2D.Double(0.0, 0.0, this.backgroundImage.getWidth(null),
090                                this.backgroundImage.getHeight(null));
091                this.backgroundImageAlignment.align(dest, area);
092                Shape savedClip = g2.getClip();
093                g2.clip(area);
094                g2.drawImage(this.backgroundImage, (int) dest.getX(), (int) dest.getY(), (int) dest.getWidth() + 1,
095                                (int) dest.getHeight() + 1, null);
096                g2.setClip(savedClip);
097                g2.setComposite(savedComposite);
098        }
099
100        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
101                return (PlotProduct) super.clone();
102        }
103}
